name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, **SQL**, and **NoSQL**, with a strong focus on microservices architecture. Experienced in cloud environments utilizing **AWS**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless deployment and scalability of applications. Strong expertise in **CI/CD** practices and unit testing to enhance code quality and deployment efficiency. Skilled in frontend technologies including **React** and **Angular**, coupled with exceptional communication skills for effective collaboration.
Adept at implementing compliance-driven solutions aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Background in developing AI/ML platforms using Python and libraries like FastAPI and Django, along with MLOps practices for model orchestration and automation.

Designed and built microservices architectures using **Java** and **Spring**, ensuring scalability and maintainability across complex applications.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for efficient application deployment and management, achieving deployment frequency of more than **10 releases/month**.
Developed robust backend services with **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, leading to an improvement in data retrieval performance by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to document and communicate system designs and architecture, enhancing team understanding and project alignment.
Conducted thorough **unit testing** and integration testing using tools like JUnit, ensuring high code quality and reducing defect rates by **25%**.
Integrated frontend applications with frameworks such as **React**, providing seamless user experiences and responsive implementations.
Improved application reliability and uptime through the application of **Docker**, leading to a **15%** increase in system availability.
Participated in Agile ceremonies, fostering open communication and collaboration among team members to drive project success.
Maintained detailed technical documentation and created knowledge-sharing sessions to support ongoing development efforts and team skill enhancement.

Implemented and maintained **microservices** architecture using **Java** and **Spring**, enhancing the scalability of core financial platforms to handle over **10,000** transactions per minute.
Developed containerized applications with **Docker** and deployed across **Kubernetes** clusters, ensuring efficient resource utilization and seamless scalability.
Designed and optimized SQL and **NoSQL** databases, improving data retrieval times by **30%** for high-volume financial applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish best practices for **CI/CD**, reducing deployment time by **40%** through automated pipelines and continuous integration.
Conducted **unit testing** and documentation of codebases, maintaining code quality and compliance with industry standards, leading to a **20%** reduction in bug occurrences post-deployment.
Streamlined communication between teams to facilitate agile project methodologies, ensuring alignment on project goals and timelines, contributing to a **15%** increase in project delivery speed.
Led efforts to modernize legacy applications to **microservices**, resulting in improved maintainability and ease of updates with a **98%** successful transition rate.

• Developed robust backend microservices primarily using **Java** and **Spring**, ensuring high availability and reliability in a distributed environment with **Docker** for containerization.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate testing and deployment processes, enhancing software delivery speed and minimizing manual errors.
• Designed and maintained relational databases with **SQL** and non-relational databases with **NoSQL** options, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for high-demand applications.
• Leveraged cloud services like **AWS** to deploy and scale applications, ensuring optimal performance and resource utilization.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to build dynamic user interfaces utilizing **Angular** and **React**, ensuring responsive design and seamless integration with backend services.
• Developed comprehensive unit tests to improve code quality and maintainability, supporting continuous integration practices and fostering a culture of testing.
• Contributed to documentation for APIs and system architecture, facilitating knowledge sharing and onboarding of new team members.
• Engaged in effective communication with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on project goals and timelines, facilitating successful project delivery.
• Participated in the design and architecture of applications deployed in **OpenShift** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring efficient orchestration of containerized applications.
• Optimized system performance and resiliency by implementing techniques like load balancing and caching strategies using technologies like **Redis**.
